WITH MY_CHAT_ROOM AS ( SELECT id , trade_id , seller_id , buyer_id , status , created_at FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE seller_id = #{userId} OR buyer_id = #{userId} ), LAST_MESSAGE AS ( SELECT chat_room_id , message , created_at , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rn FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE chat_room_id IN (SELECT id FROM MY_CHAT_ROOM) ) SELECT CR.id AS chatRoomId , CR.seller_id , U_S.nickname AS sellerNickname , CR.buyer_id , U_B.nickname AS buyerNickname , CR.status , CR.created_at , LM.message AS lastMessage , LM.created_at AS lastMessageAt , T.id , T.type , T.title FROM MY_CHAT_ROOM CR INNER JOIN USER U_S ON U_S.id = CR.seller_id INNER JOIN USER U_B ON U_B.id = CR.buyer_id LEFT JOIN LAST_MESSAGE LM ON LM.chat_room_id = CR.id AND LM.rn = 1 INNER JOIN TRADE T ON T.id = CR.trade_id ORDER BY lastMessageAt DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
